task.title: Subscribe to Visual Testing via Katalon website

taskbody.context: You can purchase the monthly/annual VTP as follows:

step.cmd: Go to the Katalon pricing page.
Click on the Visual Testing tab.
Select the Monthly or Annual billing, then click Buy now in the Visual Testing Professional section.
Sign in with your Katalon account.
step.info: You will be navigated to the TestOps admin page.

step.cmd: Choose your organization (if you have multiple organizations).
Fill in the required information and enter your payment method, then click Checkout.

taskbody.result: You have subscribed to the VTP package successfully.
